attributes.action: Stop sending our money to aid every other country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We as a nation send billions abroad in the name of aid. We can not aid every country and not get paid back. It is our money being sent not the governments. That money can be put into education , hospitals and other services. Aid should only be sent in emergancies. But it appears our government wants to help every country to cure its problems with money but it can not cure ours.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
